text: Odo biscop of Baius gret Landfranc arcebiscop & Hæimonem scir gerefan, & ealle þæs kinges þegenas on Cænt freondlice.

Si eow eallum cuð, þæt ic Odo biscop of Baius, & eorl on Cænt geann ure moder þæt is Christes circean on Cantwarebyrig þas fuwer dæne landes þæt is Losenham, & Aðalardæn dæne, & Blacecotan & Acdæna, swa þæt se laford Landfranc arcebiscop & ealle his æftergængan hi heom geagnian on ece yrfe.

Þis ic do for mines lafordes alysednesse Willelmes kinges, & for minre, & for þæra manna alysednesse, be þæra halu me is sinderlice gymene & for gehwyrfe fif & twentigra æcera landes: þa licgað wiðinnan minum deorfalde æt Wiccham.
